alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 3:17PM AKDT until August 09 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT Wednesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...Northeast 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the lower 80s. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning could cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
